post:
Hi guys,

Firstly, thanks for your popularity on the voucher codes we provided last month - greatly appreciated.

**We've just launched a new location I think you'd be very interested in! **

![](https://image.ibb.co/hMqRrx/c1_mel1.jpg)

**Melbourne, Australia**

We have brand new infrastructure that's blowing our enterprise competitors out of the water; we're seeing 140% performance increases at VM-level, 3.5-5x Storage speed increases (compared with previous clouds), we now have 10Gbit NAS/Template/Backup connectivity for rapid restore, VM deployment time is 4x faster, give it a try!

The "base" offer is;
1 Xeon Gold CPU core | 
1GB RAM | 
25GB Enterprise SSD | 
1IP

€5/month | $5.90/month

https://manage.dediserve.com/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=375

More importantly, there's 50% off the location for the first month it's live.

**Flexible Resource Link**: https://manage.dediserve.com/index.php?cmd=module&module=54&cid=857

**Fixed Instance Link**: https://manage.dediserve.com/index.php?cmd=module&module=54&cid=858

See full details here;
https://www.dediserve.com/blog/dediserve-expands-into-melbourne-australia
